scripts.test: TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=warn RUST_LOG=warn RUST_BACKTRACE=1 node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node index.ts
scripts.build-test: cd ../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc app pack workdir -r && cd tests && npm test
